Title: An Act Constituting Sitio Balinpusa of Barangay Inerangan in the Municipality of Alaminos, Province of Pangasinan, into a New Barangay to be Known as Barangay San Antonio
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 285
An Act Constituting Sitio Balinpusa of Barangay Inerangan in the Municipality of Alaminos, Province of Pangasinan, into a New Barangay to be Known as Barangay San Antonio
Section 1. The Sitio of Balinpusa of Barangay Inerangan, in the municipality of Alaminos, Province of Pangasinan, is hereby separated from Barangay Inerangan and constituted into a new barangay in said municipality to be known as Barangay San Antonio.1âwphi1
Section 2. The Barangay San Antonio shall be bounded as follows:

"Bounded on the N., along line 2-1 by river, on the N.E., along line 1-5 by San Jose; on the S.E., along line 5-4-3 by Barangay Pugo; and along line 3-2 by Barangay Landoc. Beginning at a point marked "1" on the prepared plan of proposed Barangay San Antonio, being N. 47°, 47′W., 4,296.91 m. from BLLM No. 1, CAD 325-D Alaminos Cadastre; thence S. 88°, 42′W., 646.32 m. to point 2; thence S. 23°, 33′E 1,434.05 m. to point 3; thence N. 07°, 31′E., 164.07 m. to point 4; thence N. 68°, 38′E., 544.54 m. to point 5; thence N. 25°, 12′W., 1,071.07 m. to point of beginning, containing an area of seventy-two point eight hundred eighty-three (72.883) hectares. All points referred to are indicated on the prepared plan and marked on the ground as follows: points 1, 5, & 4 are B.B.M. No. 34, B.B.M. No. 31, & B.B.M. No. 30, respectively. Points 3 & 2 are P.S. cyl. Conc. Mons. Bearings true."

Section 3. After ratification by the majority of the votes cast in a plebiscite to be conducted in the area or areas affected within a period of ninety days after the approval of this Act, the President shall appoint the officials of the new barangay.
Section 4. The barangay herein created shall begin to exist upon appointment and qualification of its officers.
Section 5. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: November 14, 1982
